# Problem 1
First we create a dataframe with 4 vectors

```{r createdf1}
library(tidyverse)
df1 = tibble(
  normSamp = rnorm(8),                    #normal sample
  logicVect = normSamp > 0,               #logical
  charVect = character(length = 8),       #character
  factorVect = factor(c(1,2,3,1,2,3,1,2)) #factor
)
```

Use the as.numeric function to convert vectors
```{r convert, eval=FALSE}
a = as.numeric(pull(df1,logicVect))
b = as.numeric(pull(df1,charVect))
c = as.numeric(pull(df1,factorVect))
```

Convert logical vector 3 ways,then multiply by random sample
```{r prob1math}
as.numeric(pull(df1,logicVect))*pull(df1,normSamp)
as.factor(pull(df1,logicVect))*pull(df1,normSamp)
as.numeric(as.factor(pull(df1,logicVect)))*pull(df1,normSamp)
```

# Problem 2
First we create a dataframe with 5 vectors
```{r createdf2}
df2 = tibble(
  x = rnorm(500),
  y = rnorm(500),
  grtr1 = (x+y) > 1
)
```
